subtitleNullable: A verbose dataset for models which need to be trained on Financial Sentiment
descriptionNullable: This dataset was made in mind for training a bot that will mainly be checking the sentiment of a news headline and the impact it would have on the stock/ entity involved in the headline. For example: "Company X becomes the leaders of production of Y". Looking at this sentence, we can tell that company X will probably experience a surge in their stock price. The model does the same. If it detects the presence of an increase in the stock price, it will reply with positive, else negative.
title: finanical sentiment analysis
subtitle: A verbose dataset for models which need to be trained on Financial Sentiment
description: This dataset was made in mind for training a bot that will mainly be checking the sentiment of a news headline and the impact it would have on the stock/ entity involved in the headline. For example: "Company X becomes the leaders of production of Y". Looking at this sentence, we can tell that company X will probably experience a surge in their stock price. The model does the same. If it detects the presence of an increase in the stock price, it will reply with positive, else negative.
